name(Volcanic Winter II- High Rider's kingdom)

snap(50,50,50)

sky(255,255,255)
fog(144,144,144)
ground(255,0,0)
polys(144,0,0)

fadefrom(8000)
density(8)

nlaps(2)

set(47,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,0)p
set(10,0,11200,0)p
set(28,0,7600,0)pr
set(31,-1400,24400,0)pr
set(31,1400,24400,0)pr
set(31,0,24400,0)pr
